meta.title: Meilisearch
meta.description: An open-source, blazingly fast, and hyper-relevant search engine that will improve your search experience

hero.title: Find the perfect plan for a perfect search
hero.description: Whatever your needs, we can find the right plan that will fit your business perfectly.

pricing.freeDescription: Start using Meilisearch now by downloading our open source version. You will have the possibility in the future to move to our cloud easily.
pricing.cloudDescription: Hosted and fully‑managed options for Meilisearch, designed for all your deployment and business needs.
pricing.enterpriseDescription: Contact our sales team to ask for a fully custom quote.

table.title: Lorem ipsum title
table.interfaceToManageApiKeys: Interface to manage your API keys

faq.title: FAQs
faq.question1: What is the best server size for my needs?
faq.answer2: Yes, we offer custom invoicing for Enterprise customers. Contact our sales team to learn more.
faq.question3: Can I switch from my self-hosted project to a cloud project?
faq.question5: I have never used a search engine before. Can I use Meilisearch anyway?
faq.question6: Do I need to configure Meilisearch to get it working?
faq.question7: How to know if Meilisearch perfectly fits my use cases?
faq.answer7: Since Meilisearch is an open-source and easy-to-use tool, you can give it a try using your data. Follow this guide to get a quick start! Besides, we published a comparison between Meilisearch and other search engines with the goal of providing an overview of Meilisearch alternatives.
